Took a gambke and hit jackpot! Found the perfect pants for a special occasion.

I bought these parachute pants for my granddaughters birthday. Each year she makes an Amazon list and these were the number one thing she had in her list. When they came in I looked at the package but didn’t open them because I wanted her to be the first to open them at her party. When she opened the package and saw them, she was ecstatic! I still wasn’t sure about them, so I made her go try them on…they were so cute in her! She’s in college and she absolutely loved them. She ended up wearing them the rest of the day. Huge hit!!! ❤️

10/10 pants!! I wore them to the Taylor swift concert and they were some comfy and breathable and looked so cute. They are a bit big so you can probably size down, but there is also adjustable strings that you can tie it tighter if you want that baggier look!
Super comfortable parachute pants, my daughter loves them. She uses them mainly for dance and can easily move/stretch in them. Fit true to size, vibrant color and fast shipping.
